name: Piano Cube !
description:
Memorization of cube algorithms may be difficult. Music is very easy to memorize. Double your muscle memory with Piano Cube!

Every melody is an algorithm and every algorithm is a melody. Find new algorithms or compose some music just by turning the 2×2×2 or 3×3×3 cube! Create cube patterns using musical patterns!

Piano Cube is a great and unique tool for beginners, intermediates and advanced cubers.

Main features:
◈ 16 2×2×2 and 3×3×3 cubes
◈ Western or Japanese cube color scheme
◈ Preset or custom piano keyboards
◈ Timer, turn metric, scramble and reset functions
◈ Progress and preferences autosave function
◈ Change the cube and its design on the fly
◈ Choose your preferred instrument and app theme
◈ Change to portrait or landscape mode while playing
◈ Swap or hide the piano keyboard on the fly
◈ Enable or disable sounds, cube motion and status bar
◈ Ad-Free
